title: John Wick Champion
body: I can't be the only one to be wanting a John Wick champion, like John Wick is epic and you could easily base a character off him and multible skins from his multible outfits, what could possibly go wrong?

replies.body: He does not fit in this game what so ever. Look hes awesome, hes cool but he doesn't need to be in every damn thing
He should be in every damn thing
issue is copy right right would have to pay whatever studio who owns the rights to wick alot of $$$ and then hope they recoup it by sales of the champ /skins etc
I bet they could work something out for this
